name: KANKEINASHI: un-Connected
description:
Inspired by the absurd action of the WarioWare and KUUKIYOMI franchises, KANKEINASHI: un-Connected takes a twist on the microgame genre by tying it all back to one theme: CONNECTION!

Navigate varied scenarios, form meaningful relationships, and burn some bridges as your ability to forge Connections gets put to the test!

Content Warning: Contains crude humor & mildly suggestive themes.

Team:

Daniel Qi, Programming, University of California, Irvine

Timothy Quach, Design/Art, University of California, Irvine

Al Prachumsri, Design, University of California, Irvine

Michelle Wang, Art, University of California, Irvine

Made for the College Game Jam 2021 hosted by Julia Shen and Patrick Visan.
